plot: In the tradition of American Bandstand, Get It Together was a show where the hottest bands of the day appeared to perform their latest records in front of a live teen audience.
plot_en: In the tradition of American Bandstand, Get It Together was a show where the hottest bands of the day appeared to perform their latest records in front of a live teen audience.
plot_es: In the tradition of American Bandstand, Get It Together was a show where the hottest bands of the day appeared to perform their latest records in front of a live teen audience.
title: Get It Together
